title: PODCAST: The billion-dollar sweatshirt industry
contentencoded: For high school seniors, March and April mean the arrival of college acceptances – and a rush on college bookstores to buy sweatshirts to proclaim their new status.  A look at how admission seasons have created a billion dollar. More on that. Publishing giant Harper Collins is reportedly at odds with Amazon over details of its contract renewal. We explain how their fight will impact readers.
teaser: Publisher Harper Collins picks a fight with Amazon. Plus, college admission season means sweatshirt for everyone.
